caption.p: Growth rate in cm day-1 ( a) and mg day-1 ( b) of seedlings, germinated under different NaCl concentrations on host Arabidopsis thaliana (Cuscuta spp.) or soil (other species). Data represent mean ± SE. Different letters represent statistical significance at p ≤ 0.05, Tukey’s post hoc test. One-way ANOVA F-values are given below, * p ≤ 0.05, ** p ≤ 0.01. Levene’s homogeneity test: p > 0.05.
